room_title: Escape room "Creature Room 2016" by Escape Challenge in Rochester (MN)
review: My father in law was not too keen on the idea but reluctantly we convinced him to come with. We were greeted by an excellent staff and had a wonderful and challenging time with the Creature Room. Finally after making it in and just completing with 4 seconds to spare we escaped and nothing was more gratifying than seeing the smile on my father-in-law's face. We all had a wonderful time and I would strongly recommend to anyone to please check this place out you will not be dissapointed!
